title: After 17 years in prison, will Andrew Malkinson finally clear his name?
description: Almost two decades ago Andrew Malkinson was accused of a rape where the victim was left for dead. He has always maintained his innocence and his supporters say the case against him was fatally flawed. Now he hopes new evidence will show he was not guilty. Help support our independent journalism at theguardian.com/infocus
episode: After 17 years in prison, will Andrew Malkinson finally clear his name?
creator: The Guardian
